text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires identifying at least two mechanisms of employer resistance, such as outsourcing and statistical masking. The candidate answer explicitly lists both: 'Firms may restructure job titles or outsource lower-paid roles to improve reported numbers without changing actual compensation' (Outsourcing/Restructuring) and 'Aggregate reporting can mask within-occupation gaps while overstating between-occupation differences' (Statistical Masking/Measurement challenges).", "criterion_id": "226d3d3f-71b5-4749-82f1-943ef9515f6e"}
